story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_0100_10: (Wow... Both of them are so strong!)
story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_0200_10:
(Cheren battles with incredible energy while
keeping in sync with his Pokémon.)
story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
(Alder, on the other hand, has a wealth of
experience, allowing him to adapt instantly
and choose the best tactics with ease!)
story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_0500_10: OK, let’s wrap it up! Good job, Volcarona.
story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Volcarona went up against Tornadus—
a Legendary, Neo Champion Pokémon with
incredible power.
story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Normally, an opponent like that would be
difficult to beat.
story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_0900_10:
But if you truly understand your partner
Pokémon and bring out its full strength,
you can have a real chance of winning!
story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_1000_10:
So, who’s stronger—me or Cheren? Even I
don’t know the answer!
story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_1100_10:
What is strength, exactly? I want you all to
think carefully about that!
story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Alder has years of experience and spent a
lot of time with his Pokémon.
story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_1400_10:
No matter how much we hone our skills,
we can never surpass that.
story_arceus_04_07000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I hope we can be like him and always stay
together with our Pokémon...even when we
grow older!
